name: Bladeworks
description:
A wave-based roguelike where you fight against increasingly difficult enemies while also getting stronger yourself. 

You start with 2 swords that when charged up (by attacking enemies) can be temporarily connected into a glaive for massive AOE damage.

This project was very ambitious and I barely finished in time, therefore, expect it to be unbalanced and full of bugs. I apologize in advance and hope you still enjoy the experience.
